title: Competency Development Program for Utilizing Food Composition Data

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational nutrition knowledge, food analysis methods, and data interpretation experience
context.additional_context: A blended learning program for practicing elementary educators to systematically acquire methods for utilizing food composition data.

learning_goals: Explain the collection, verification, and interpretation process of food composition data in three or more distinct phases
Analyze real-world cases using the FAO/INFOODS food classification system
Identify food nutrition data error cases with 80% accuracy using interactive modules within the LMS
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
